Description: Sycomore fig wood figure of a jackal, from a funerary context, head and body made separately, tail missing, originally covered with gessoe and painted black.
Curator's comments: Published: T. Phillips [ed.], Africa, London 1995, p. 97 [1.63] = T. Phillips [ed.], Afrika, Berlin 1996, p.97 [1.63].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2006-present, Glasgow, Kelvingrove Art Gallery and Museum, LT Loan Ancient Egypt British Museum Partnership Gallery
